mapper.sql: ID, SUPPLIER_ID, EXTRACTS_ID, CREATED_AT, OPERATING_TYPE, IS_DELETED, REASON
mapper.insert: insert into T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_EXT_RELATE ( SUPPLIER_ID, EXTRACTS_ID, OPERATING_TYPE, IS_DELETED, REASON) values ( #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extractsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatingType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_EXT_RELATE
ID,
SUPPLIER_ID,
EXTRACTS_ID,
CREATED_AT,
OPERATING_TYPE,
IS_DELETED,
REASON,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{extractsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createdAt,jdbcType=DATE},
#{operatingType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

mapper.update:
update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_EXT_RELATE
SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXTRACTS_ID = #{extractsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=DATE},
OPERATING_TYPE = #{operatingType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REASON = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_EXT_RELATE set SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXTRACTS_ID = #{extractsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=DATE}, OPERATING_TYPE = #{operatingType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REASON = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT ER."ID" AS erid, ER.REASON, ER.OPERATING_TYPE, SS.* FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_EXT_RELATE er INNER JOIN T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER ss ON ss."ID" = er.SUPPLIER_ID
